Module com.gersonfaneto.yams
Package com.gersonfaneto.yams.dao

Interface CRUD<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type to be manipulated in the CRUD operations.
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientCRUD, ComponentCRUD, InvoiceCRUD, PaymentCRUD, PurchaseOrderCRUD, ServiceCRUD, UserCRUD, WorkOrderCRUD
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientDiskDAO, ClientMemoryDAO, ComponentDiskDAO, ComponentMemoryDAO, InvoiceDiskDAO, InvoiceMemoryDAO, PaymentDiskDAO, PaymentMemoryDAO, PurchaseOrderDiskDAO, PurchaseOrderMemoryDAO, ServiceDiskDAO, ServiceMemoryDAO, UserDiskDAO, UserMemoryDAO, WorkOrderDiskDAO, WorkOrderMemoryDAO
public interface CRUD<T>
Defines a generic interface for the basic CRUD operations.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Gerson Ferreira dos Anjos Neto

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    createOne(T newObject)
    Inserts a given Object in the Database, by defining its ID.
    boolean
    deleteByID(String targetID)
    Deletes a stored Object given its ID.
    boolean
    deleteMany()
    Deletes all stored Objects!

    Searches for a Object given its ID.

  • Method Details

    • createOne

      T createOne(T newObject)
      Inserts a given Object in the Database, by defining its ID.
      Parameters:
      newObject - The Object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The updated Object.

    • findByID

      T findByID(String targetID)
      Searches for a Object given its ID.
      Parameters:
      targetID - The ID of the targeted Object.
      Returns:
      The found Object or null if the targetID didn't match any of the registered Objects.

    • findMany

      List<T> findMany()
      Retrieves all stored Objects.
      Returns:
      A list of all the found Objects.

    • updateInformation

      boolean updateInformation(T updatedObject)
      Updates a stored Object after its information was changed.
      Parameters:
      updatedObject - The updated Object.
      Returns:
      true if the Object was found and updated, or false , if it wasn't.

    • deleteByID

      boolean deleteByID(String targetID)
      Deletes a stored Object given its ID.
      Parameters:
      targetID - The ID of the targeted Object.
      Returns:
      true if the Object was found and removed, or false , if it wasn't.

    • deleteMany

      boolean deleteMany()
      Deletes all stored Objects!
      Returns:
      true if there wore any stored Objects and they were deleted, of false if there weren't any.
